ygData.subject: Re: Some Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: IMO 1. No contest formans tunic all the way. 2. East Karan should still be giving you some exp. I cant remember for sure where I hunted at that level but I
ygData.messageBody:
IMO

1. No contest formans tunic all the way.
2. East Karan should still be giving you some exp. I cant remember for sure
where I hunted at that level but I think I made a few excusrions to Cazic
thule and joined a group fighitng at the zone.
3. The surname you choose must come from within yourself or you close
friends. as only they and yourself know your true nature.

Kizmet Bayashi
Monk of the 45th....
E-Marr server
Da`Kor

----- Original Message -----
From: Worlord <worlord99@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, November 27, 1999 11:00 AM
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Some Questions


> From: Worlord <worlord99@...>
>
> I recently aquired the level 20 on my monk. I have
> some questions.
>
> 1) I managed to buy some Cured Silk Armor for a
> relativily low price. So my choice is between Cured
> Silk Gi or Foreman's tunic. Any input?
>
> 2) Where is a good place for a level 20 to hunt.
> >From 14-17 I hunted oasis and from 17-20 I hunted East
> Karana. Any recomendations?
>
> 3) Anyone know a good surname for a Monk named
> Hammeron
>
>
> Hammeron
> Monk of Quellious
